LanguageData.TinyBuilderClear_Description: Removes incorrect build cache data, allowing construction at the correct position again.
LanguageData.TinyBuilderClear_Warning: Are you sure you want to clear the build cache? Current construction offsets may be reset.
LanguageData.TinyBuilderSelect_Description: Selects the nearest decoration object at the mouse cell.
LanguageData.TinyBuilderSelect_NoTinyThing: No decoration found in this cell.
LanguageData.TinyBuilderDeconstruct_Description: Deconstructs the nearest decoration object at the mouse cell.
LanguageData.TinyBuilderCancel_Description: Cancels construction of the nearest decoration object at the mouse cell.
